1.0.name: wordpress/cookiecert-eu-cookie-directive
1.0.description:
This CookieCert plugin makes your WordPress site compliant with the EU Cookie Directive in an instant. Once installed it will ask users for consent to allow your site to create cookies.

In addition the tag will provide a link to your site's unique page on CookieCert.com which details the cookies found during independent cookie audits of your site.

As a consent tag user your site will be designated as EU Cookie Compliant in the CookieCert database and on cookiecert.com.

http://www.cookiecert.com
